name: Cockroach-Hooray
description:
Cockroach Hooray Rules:

- You are cockroach

- You need to get to yellow cheese in one of rooms

- There is guy who doesn't like cockroach

- You need avoid him and you can hide in different shelters

- Your are cockroach and don't like light. That's why you move very slow when lights is on. Every 10 seconds the guy will switch light.

- The guy doesn't see without light but still can notice if you come too close 

Control:

- Use arrows to move
